alert.note: Alert for Adams; Scioto (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 5:29PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF LEWIS, SOUTHERN ADAMS AND SOUTHWESTERN SCIOTO COUNTIES THROUGH 600 PM EDT... At 529 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Vanceburg, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Portsmouth, West Union, Manchester, Vanceburg, Head of Grassy, Camp Dix, Tollesboro, Rome, Blue Creek, Concord, Trinity, Saint Paul, Dunkinsville, Bradysville, Kinniconick, Epworth, Ribolt, Friendship, Charters, and Bentonville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
